metadata.title: CVE-2021-20308 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the htmldoc 1.9.11 and before may allow attackers toexecute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service that is similar toCVE-2017-9181.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
